lg.l: Don't you know the sun isn't round
all the waterfalls and seashells you find
Stays the same as I've been an envy of all
you had your hand on
Once you've gone I'm all alone
I'm running around
fading to the crowd
a call in your name
wears out fades into the grey
Don't you know the walls never end here
if only god keep them aside
all in all
you'll never be left on your own
never be left out
Once you've gone I'm all alone...
I could have been your way out
But once you've gone I'm all alone
I'm running around
fading to the crowd
a call in your name
wears out fades into the grey
waiting for you to return home
